displaying code within inner html.text: by default all code set via html will be added as html in the dom rather than as text, so if you want to show an html code sample you can create a pipe to replace < with &lt; and > with &gt;

arguments to angular pipes.text: when adding a pipe to your template use : to then pass parameters, : delimited for multiples,
